short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that opens a white screen with fullscreen capability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
White Screen is a lightweight and easy-to-use Chrome extension that allows you to open a blank white screen at the click of a button. Perfect for presentations, web development testing, or using your screen as a blank canvas, this extension offers a minimalist and distraction-free environment.

Key Features:

Instant White Screen: Quickly open a blank white screen in a new tab with just one click.
Toggle Fullscreen Mode: With the ability to toggle fullscreen mode, you can use your entire screen space, free from browser toolbars and distractions.
Simple and Intuitive: The user interface is clean and straightforward, with just two essential buttons—Open White Screen and Toggle Fullscreen.
Lightweight: The extension is small and fast, ensuring that it doesn’t slow down your browser.
Versatile Use Cases: Whether you're testing a website’s fullscreen functionality, giving a presentation, or simply need a white screen for a moment of focus, this extension is perfect for various scenarios.
How to Use:

Add the Extension: Once installed, you’ll see the White Screen icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Open White Screen: Click the extension icon to open the popup, then click "Open White Screen." A new tab will open with a plain white background.
Toggle Fullscreen: In the popup, you can also click "Toggle Fullscreen" to enter fullscreen mode. Double-clicking the white screen itself will also toggle fullscreen mode.
Exit Fullscreen: Press the Esc key or use the "Toggle Fullscreen" button again to exit fullscreen mode.
Why Use White Screen?

Presentations: Use the white screen as a clean backdrop during presentations or meetings.
Focus: Eliminate distractions with a blank screen when you need to concentrate.
Testing: Web developers can use it to test how their content behaves in fullscreen mode.
Support and Feedback:
We’re constantly looking to improve White Screen. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please feel free to leave feedback or reach out to us.

Privacy Policy:
This extension does not collect, store, or share any personal data. It requires no special permissions, ensuring your privacy is respected.
